result.title: Evaluation toolbox
result.description: A set of practical instruments to guide the network actors in setting relevant metrics in the scaling process and conducting impact evaluation This set will include protocols and instruments for the utilisation of the TEIT The Evidence Integration Triangle in to support the scalingup process of innovative solutionsservices including a participatory protocol with instruments for designing implementing and evaluating innovative solutions together with stakeholders The toolbox formulates overarching methodological and analytical approach for conducting impact evaluation This toolbox will be integrated into the roadmap
